headline: Qualcomm Expands Beyond Mobile Chips With Growing AI Edge Story
summary: QUALCOMM is expanding into AI edge computing and on-device AI through new partnerships and venture investments. Recent agreements include work with Lantronix and Safe Pro Group on real-time AI threat detection for drones. The company is also backing SpotDraft, which uses AI to support contract management workflows. These moves broaden QUALCOMM's use of its Snapdragon platform beyond its traditional mobile chip business. QUALCOMM (NasdaqGS:QCOM), trading at $152.22, is pushing further into...
